parameters.name: Concurrency
parameters.description: The number of worker threads to run in Istio Proxy.

parameters.name: ExcludeIPRanges
parameters.description: The range of IP addresses that are allowed to access external services. (`global.proxy.excludelPRanges`)

parameters.name: ExcludeInboundPorts
parameters.description: The port that the inbound traffic of the sidecar proxy does not pass through.

parameters.name: ExcludeOutboundPorts
parameters.description: The port that the outbound traffic of the sidecar proxy does not pass through.

parameters.name: HoldApplicationUntilProxyStarts
parameters.description:
Specifies whether applications can be started only after Istio Proxy starts. Valid values:

*   `true`: Applications can be started only after Istio Proxy starts.
*   `false`: Applications can be started before Istio Proxy starts.

parameters.name: IncludeIPRanges
parameters.description: The range of IP addresses that are denied to access external services. (`global.proxy.includelPRanges`)

parameters.name: IncludeInboundPorts
parameters.description: The port that the inbound traffic of the sidecar proxy passes through.

parameters.name: IncludeOutboundPorts
parameters.description: The port that the outbound traffic of the sidecar proxy passes through.

parameters.name: InterceptionMode
parameters.description:
The mode in which the sidecar proxy intercepts inbound traffic. Valid values:

*   `REDIRECT`: The sidecar proxy intercepts inbound traffic in the REDIRECT mode.
*   `TPROXY`: The sidecar proxy intercepts inbound traffic in the TPROXY mode.

parameters.name: IstioDNSProxyEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the Domain Name System (DNS) proxy feature. Valid values:

*   `true`: The DNS proxy feature is enabled.
*   `false`: The DNS proxy feature is disabled.

parameters.name: Lifecycle
parameters.description: The lifecycle of the sidecar proxy.

parameters.name: LogLevel
parameters.description: The log level. Valid values: `info`, `debug`, `tracing`, and `error`.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace for which you want to update the sidecar proxy configurations.

parameters.name: PostStart
parameters.description: The post-start parameters of Istio Proxy.

parameters.name: PreStop
parameters.description: The pre-close parameters of Istio Proxy.

parameters.name: ProxyInitCPUResourceLimit
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPU cores that are available to the sidecar proxy init container.

parameters.name: ProxyInitCPUResourceRequest
parameters.description: The minimum number of CPU cores that are requested by the sidecar proxy init container.

parameters.name: ProxyInitMemoryResourceLimit
parameters.description: The maximum size of memory that is available to the sidecar proxy init container.

parameters.name: ProxyInitMemoryResourceRequest
parameters.description: The minimum size of memory that is requested by the sidecar proxy init container.

parameters.name: ProxyMetadata
parameters.description: The environment variables that are added to a sidecar proxy. The environment variables are represented as JSON objects. The keys and values in the JSON objects represent the keys and values added to the environment variables of the sidecar proxy.

parameters.name: ProxyStatsMatcher
parameters.description: The monitoring metrics for data collected by Envoy proxies. The value is in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the ASM instance.

parameters.name: SidecarProxyCPUResourceLimit
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPU cores that are available to the sidecar proxy container.

parameters.name: SidecarProxyCPUResourceRequest
parameters.description: The minimum number of CPU cores that are requested by the sidecar proxy container.

parameters.name: SidecarProxyMemoryResourceLimit
parameters.description: The maximum size of memory that is available to the sidecar proxy container.

parameters.name: SidecarProxyMemoryResourceRequest
parameters.description: The minimum size of memory that is requested by the sidecar proxy container.

parameters.name: TerminationDrainDuration
parameters.description: The maximum period of time that the sidecar proxy waits for a request to end.

parameters.name: Tracing
parameters.description:
The custom configurations of Tracing Analysis. The configurations must be serialized into JSON strings. The configurations contain the following parameters:

*   `sampling`: The sampling rate, which is of the DOUBLE type.

*   `custom_tags`: The custom tags added to reported spans, which are of the MAP type. The key of a tag is of the string type. The value of a tag is in the JSON format. A custom tag can belong to one of the following types:

    *   `literal`: The tag value is a fixed value in the JSON format. This tag must contain the `value` field that specifies a literal. Example: `{"value":"test"}`.
    *   `header`: The tag value is a request header in the JSON format. This tag must contain the `name` field and `defaultValue` field.The name field indicates the name of the request header. The defaultValue field indicates the default value that is used when no request header is available. Example: `{"name":"test","defaultValue":"test"}`.
    *   `environment`: The tag value is an environment variable in the JSON format. This tag must contain the `name` field and `defaultValue` field. The name field indicates the name of the environment variable. The defaultValue field indicates the environment variable that is used when no environment variable is available. Example: `{"name":"test","defaultValue":"test"}`.
